snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter, visiting Incirlik Air Base in southern Turkey, said he was “looking for the rest of the world to step up.”
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter travels to Turkey to urge Persian Gulf states to take larger role in fight against Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter, visiting Incirlik Air Base in southern Turkey, said he was “looking for the rest of the world to step up.”

headline.main: U.S. Defense Chief Ashton Carter Prods Gulf States to Take Larger Role in ISIS Fight
headline.print_headline: U.S. Defense Chief Prods Gulf States to Take Larger Role in ISIS Fight

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
